body: If a spectator kills a player in walls they tp to a regular world. FrankenRavi killed me then I killed him by knocking him off a high place as a spectator. Then he spawned in a random world with two signs. The kill.The sign that was there with a lot of swearing.Remove this if you want just thought I would show it. The other sign.
